pr_title: feat(kms): add integrity verification to samples of crypto operations

timeline.message: feat(kms): add integrity verification to samples of crypto operations
Deal with long to int implicit conversion
Fix IllegalStateException caused by fetching Long from HashCode
Add print outs to debug ciphertext checksum mismatch
ugghhh I should really quit already
Fix build error by adding explicit conversion to string
Remove response handling from try block to see impact on failing tests
Add -e to mvn command and experiment with prints to STDERR

timeline.bodyText: Any reason you're using asInt() here? I tried this with padToLong() and the tests started to consistently pass. https://guava.dev/releases/19.0/api/docs/com/google/common/hash/HashCode.html#padToLong()
timeline.author: shubha-rajan

timeline.message: Try HashCode.padToLong in EncryptSymmetric and DecryptSymmetric

timeline.author: shubha-rajan

replies.bodyText: Thanks for catching that. Performed a global search/replace.
